title: Storage Backends List
description: Information about the storage backends available on this service instance.

label.description: Freeform string label for a storage backend.

default_storage.description: If set to `true`, this is the default storage backend. The default storage backend will be used if the client does not specify a storage backend id when requesting the allocation of storage. If this parameter is not set, assume `false`. Service instances may either set one storage backend as default, or none - indicating that clients must always specify a storage backend.
